name: Child Sexual Exploitation, Abuse, and Nudity
description: Policy prohibiting content that sexually exploits or endangers children, including CSAM, solicitation, inappropriate interactions, sextortion, sexualization, nudity, and non-sexual abuse.
corePrinciple: We do not allow content or activity that sexually exploits or endangers children. When we become aware of apparent child exploitation, we report it to NCMEC in compliance with applicable law.

fetuses_babies.description: Includes fetuses and infants who cannot stand

toddlers.description: Children who can stand but are under 4 years old

defaultRules: If unsure adult vs minor → treat as minor
If unsure baby vs toddler → treat as baby
If unsure toddler vs minor → treat as minor
If unsure real vs non-real → treat as real for escalation
